title: Jon Gruden, Jim Harbaugh, Colin Kaepernick, and Nick Saban
itunes:title: Jon Gruden, Jim Harbaugh, Colin Kaepernick, and Nick Saban
description:
Colin discusses Raiders HC Jon Gruden's decision to trade LB Khalil Mack, Michigan HC Jim Harbaugh failing on the big stage, Nike's decision to support FA QB Colin Kaepernick, and Alabama HC Nick Saban overreacting to a simple question about his Quarterbacks. Guests include LaDainian Tomlinson, Joel Klatt, Greg Jennings, and Peter Schrager.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
